DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate link genetic polymorphism r7903146 , rs12255372 TCF7L2 gene risk develop hyperglycemia Intensive care unit stay
DOC.brief_title: TCF7L2 Polymorphisms Influence Glycemic Control ICU Patients With Organ Failure
DOC.criteria: admission ICU > 48h least one organ dysfunction age < 18 year pregnant woman admission less 48h
